text: Which one was it that only let you log into one workspace at a time? That was a big problem that seemed pretty fixable. Was that Mattermost?

elements.text: Which one was it that only let you log into one workspace at a time? That was a big problem that seemed pretty fixable. Was that Mattermost?

text:
I can't find anything about discounts for open source communities on MatterMost, but RocketChat at least says they offer discounts for open source communities. They don't publicly say how big that discount is though.

This is a big factor when many of us attempted the switch to Zulip. It can be self hosted, but we just use their professional cloud service for free because they offer it for free to all open source communities.
